SongLyrics.JpnStr: 踏[ふ]み込[こ]むぜアクセル
SongLyrics.EngStr: Step on the accelerator

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 駆[か]け引[ひ]きは無[な]いさ、そうだよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: No bargaining, that's right

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 夜[よる]を抜[ぬ]ける
SongLyrics.EngStr: Break through the night

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ねじ込[こ]むさ最[さい]後[ご]に
SongLyrics.EngStr: Screw it in tight at the end

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 差[さ]し引[ひ]きゼロさ、そうだよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Zero subtraction, that's right

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 日[ひ]々[び]を削[けず]る
SongLyrics.EngStr: Chipping away at the days

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 心[こころ]をそっと開[ひら]いてギュっと引[ひ]き寄[よ]せたら
SongLyrics.EngStr: Softly open your heart and draw it in close

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 届[とど]くよ屹度[きっと]伝[つた]うよもっと
SongLyrics.EngStr: It'll surely reach, it'll surely be heard

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 生[い]き急[いそ]いで搾[しぼ]り取[と]って
SongLyrics.EngStr: Live fast and squeeze out all you can

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 縺[もつ]れる足[あし]だけど前[まえ]よりずっとそう、遠[とお]くへ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Your legs may falter, but you'll always be farther

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 奪[うば]い取[と]って掴[つか]んだって
SongLyrics.EngStr: It doesn't matter what you snatch or steal

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]じゃないなら意[い]味[み]は無[な]いのさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: If it's not you, it doesn't mean anything

SongLyrics.JpnStr: だからもっと遥[はる]か彼[か]方[なた]
SongLyrics.EngStr: So go even farther… into the distance

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 偽[いつわ]る事[こと]に慣[な]れた君[きみ]の世[せ]界[かい]を
